DOC.brief_title: Inspiratory Muscle Training Chronic Thromboembolic Pulmonary Hypertension
DOC.detailed_description: 32 patient CTEPH ( confirm right cardiac catheterization image ) perform : 1 ) pulmonary function test ; 2 ) measurement maximal inspiratory pressure ( MIP ) endurance ; 3 ) evaluation peripheral muscle strength isokinetic dynamometry ; 4 ) six-minute walk test 5 ) incremental constant load cardiopulmonary exercise test ( ~ 75 % maximal work-rate ) non-invasive evaluation central hemodynamics peripheral muscle oxygenation . Inspiratory muscle train consist twice daily session 30 breath ( ~ 50 % PiMAX , 4-5 minute per session ) 8 week . The SHAM group perform session 30 breath inspiratory load .
